strings.value:
# Contribution to the Passport App  

Passport Lead (Team of 7) This contribution corresponds to the scoping, design, architecture and team management work done on the Passport App between Aug 2019 and Jan 2020. 

This work allowed us to meet 2 important HYPHA milestones:
- 5th Nov milestone;
- 20th Feb milestone preparation.

Priority Activities:
- Connection to the blockchain
- App design, look & Feel
- Performance
- UX and features: People, Forum, Wallet, Co-op (proposals) and Market.
Contribution to the Passport App. Passport Lead (Team of 7) This contribution corresponds to the scoping, design, architecture and team management work done on the Passport App.
